waiting_for_customer_action.1: Retry delivery - the customer is not in the address.
waiting_for_customer_action.3: Postponed - the customer requested postponement for another day.

no_shipment_number: Type your tracking no. to get your shipment details
problem: Is there a problem with your shipment?!
error: No record of this tracking number can be found at this time, please check the number and try again later. For further assistance, please contact Customer Service.
